channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Power Monitoring Expert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Power Monitoring Expert

item.title: CVE-2023-5391|2024-08-02T07:59:44.528Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert
item.description: A CWE-502: Deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the targeted system by sending a specifically crafted packet to the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-28003|2024-08-02T12:23:30.805Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert
item.description: A CWE-613: Insufficient Session Expiration vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker to maintain unauthorized access over a hijacked session in PME after the legitimate user has signed out of their account.
